transcript:
The person you have called is speaking
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello sollunga
Executive: Aa sir very good morning sir
Customer: Sollunga sir
Customer: Iya call pannirukanga sir avangitta than sir pesittu irukrom avangathan line la irukranga per rithish solli avan than sir vandhu payment panni post panni panni vachathu enna enna varthai sir sonnanga avanga illana yaar yaarkey complaint kodukanum enaku theriyamatinguthu ethani peruku naan phone panni phone panni message panniruken theriyumaa aal aale adhe inaiku issue koduthutey irunthingana enna artham sir idhu naan enna solren kuduka mudiyuma kudukanu sollunga illana mudiyathuna sollidunga sir naan vera aale paathirpen vera appley poirpen thevai illama ethuku sir varthai vittutu marupadi lead koodu koodu 10 10 na light sir order convert aagurathuku naan eppo naan payment pannun kooda ippo kooda oru nendiyathu than sir enaku confirm aayirukuthu athuvum vandhu 300 rupees 300 rupees enaku enna profit kedachirukum athula sollunga okay fine yen sir ethani vaati naan vandhu track kuthuruken indha maari than naan business pandren sari sir eluthi kudunga eluthi kudunganu solli naan idhu unga accept panni poduvom indha maari ethani vaaruku naan amichiruken theriyumaa aal aale adhe neenga ivangitta sollunga ivangitte sollunga yen sir maathi maathi aal kitte ellaarukittum oru vaati sollanuma naan payment pannumbodhu yen sir idhellam kekavey illa payment pannunga pannunga mattum than kekura varuthu illa sir issue irunthuna ethuku sir aal aale maathi viduringa ore aal thane enaku contact pannanga payment pannumbodhu inaiku naan ippo enna solren ungakitteye naan pesi aal aale aal kitte neenga vandhu manager athu super manager naan pesittey irukanuma sir athu than enaku velaiyaa sir kaasu kuthu employiku vandhu vachirukanum sir india mart trade india just dial adikarathuku avan order order avan summa sonnanu solli naan phone la ukara rendu phone laiye naan paatha athu than sir irukuthu 150 rupees vachittu naan enna pandrathu oru nimisham sir polaita oru nimisham naan enna solla varen listen pannunga first thing idhu vandhu paathingana corporate sector okay va ippo ungakitte employ vela paakranga salary innum adhikkama kedacha employ pogathan sir sir naan vandhu idhellam enaku vandhu sir sir kelunga sir sir kelunga sir enaku vandhu explanation thevai illa sir enaku theriyum sir naan kelunga sir idhe vandhu paathingana naan solren sir ippo en problem solli neenga kekuringala illa unga problem solli naan ippo kekkanuma sir ippo illa enaku puriyala naan neenga ootaape neenga pesittey irunthingana appo enna artham enaku enna mathippu irukutha illaiya naan pesurathuku yen issue than solrathuku than neenga kekuri irukinga neenga solrathuku naan ethuku kekkanum ippo enaku issue irukuthuna neenga sollunga sir explanation thevai illa sir varuma varatha idhu than naan kekrathu sir naan 15 naal ethuku naan summa irundhen vittutu irundhen ippothan neenga moonu naal business convert sir idhellam naan jaastha solrathu naan naan sonna enna naan email irunthu naan ungaluku amichen la sir sir ippo neenga than indha call munnadi starting la sonninga 15 naal enaku conversion rendu than iruku 300 rupees than ketrukanga andha alavuku enaku enna profit varumnu neenga than sir sonninga ippo athu 300 rupees vachittu iruntha enna sir sir previous paarunga sir naan pona varsham ellam evlo eduthiruken nu solli leedu summa neenga ethume theriyama neenga than pesathinga sir enaku issue irukuthuna kekka mudiyuma kelunga illaina neenga vittu poidunga sir varsham kaasu enaku thevai illa appadiye vachirunga sir naan video edukala oru ethume edukka matingira summa idhu vachittu summa inga paarunga sir varamaari kaamikrathu illai sir naaliku aidum sir illai sir unga issue than sir idhellam enaku vandhu kadhai naan kekrathuku naan ippo naan call pannen sir ungaluku mudiyuma mudiyatha idhu than sir en kelvi mudiyathuna sonningana naan unga disturb pannamaten eppadi vena poidunga sir naan use pannavey matten podhuma ungaluku ungaluku idhu thane venum aanaa nambi vachi kaasu vaanguningale sir rithish sollitha satisfaction illana vandhu naan refund pannrennu sonnale avangitta naan pesi varen sir sir ippo onnum illa satisfaction illana refund nu sollirunthanga illaiya athuku ethavathu proof ethavathu irukingala sir idhellam pesuringanu enaku theriyum sir inga paarunga sir idhellam vandhu naan paathachi theriyuma neengala eppadi suthi varinganu enaku theriyum sir naan enna solren kaasu ethuna sir kaasu vachikonga sir sonnathu kelunga sir kaase vachikonga enaku thevai illa sariya neenga phone vachirunga sir
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with the buylead quality and conversion rate.

- Claims promises made regarding refunds were not honored.

- Expresses frustration with constant shifting of contact persons.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for proof regarding refund commitment.

- Executive tried to explain the corporate sector policies.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Angry | Risk of churn -> Risk of churn



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, satisfaction, payment
